QuestData.Title: Shifting Cryptogram
QuestData.Description:
<The ever-shifting facets of the cube are inlaid with runes you cannot read.
Ve'nari may have an interest in it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Shifting Cryptogram to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, I have not seen these runes used in quite some time. An ancient broker method of encryption.
This will be useful should I ever intercept cartel communications.
